snippet.title: UK: Chaplain of Royal Holloway University invites hijab-wearing Muslima …
snippet.description:
* UK: Chaplain of Royal Holloway University invites hijab-wearing Muslima … that Allah is Christ, the son of Mary. Say, Then who could prevent Allah at all if He had intended to destroy Christ, the […] son of Mary, or his mother or everyone on the earth? And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and […] saying, Indeed, we have killed the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, the messenger of Allah. And they did not kill him, nor
16 weeks ago

snippet.title: What to Read: World War I
snippet.description:
* What to Read: World War I Mary Roberts Rinehart . You’re a sheltered but tougher-than-you-look American girl looking to break out of your stifling […] destructive absurdity of army discipline. Mary Louise and the Liberty Girls by Edith Van Dyne . This book makes the list […] It’s been a century since World War I began in 1914, which means it’s time for another torrent of books on the subject
14 weeks ago
